Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Belmont
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Clark, Belmont and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Clark, Belmont and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Armitage
ShortDescription: SB 94 California buses are temp. rerouted via California, Armitage, Western, North Avenue and California: due to, street blockage near California/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Armitage, Western, North Avenue and California: due to, street blockage near California/Armitage.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a door problem. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81 Lawrence

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
